description: Space expansion without money or laws. A new state of reason.
mission_text: We are creating a new form of civilization — without money, hierarchy, or laws.
Only reason, trust, and the drive toward the stars.
This is not utopia. This is the engineering of the future. Learn more about the Project.
principles_list: No money — resources are distributed by need and meaning.
No laws — behavior is regulated by reason and trust.
join_text: We are looking for engineers, philosophers, dreamers.
Join the discussion, propose ideas, help build.
made_with: Made with faith in the future.
